metadata.name: Binary Proxy Execution Via Dotnet-Trace.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects commandline arguments for executing a child process via dotnet-trace.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dotnet-trace.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('dotnet-trace.dll') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-- ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('collect')))

output.summary: Detects commandline arguments for executing a child process via dotnet-trace.exe

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of the utility in order to debug and trace a program. Reference: https://twitter.com/bohops/status/1740022869198037480
